name: whereas
posTip: A word used to join parts of a phrase or sentence.

trans_examp.trans_en: compared with the fact that; but

example.eg: He must be about 60, whereas his wife looks about 30.
example.egtrans: 他肯定有60岁上下了，可他妻子看起来只有30岁左右。

example.eg: You eat a huge plate of food for lunch, whereas I have just a sandwich.
example.egtrans: 你午饭吃了一大盘东西，可我只吃了个三明治。
